<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I am the squire of Captain Stolke, the
head of this village. It is my duty to
look after his personal needs.

194333.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「私は この里の:
I am the squire of Captain Stolke, the head of this village. It is my duty to take care of his personal needs.
However, Captain Stolke went to Gran Zedora Castle to attend a feast before the battle against the Demon King's
army, and has not returned since. He tends to disappear without permission, but as his squire, I need to know his
whereabouts.

194334.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「よく見ると:
If you look closely, you are the one who used to come to see Captain Stolke. Hmmm... , I see.
Sorry to be so blunt, but do you know where I can find Captain Stolke?

194335.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「……そうですか:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Well, that's a problem. If you see
Captain Stolke, please take the
trouble to let me know.

194336.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「……グランゼ:
I understand that you are staying at the Gran Zedora Territory watchtower. I see that you are fulfilling your
role as Ship Shaper. I am relieved to know your whereabouts.But if I can be of any assistance to Captain Stolke as
his squire...

194338.「……はぁはぁ。お待たせしました。 \n 急ごしらえですが お弁当を用意しました:
Hahaha. Sorry for the wait.I have prepared a hastily prepared lunch box. However, Captain Stolke is out of town
and I cannot leave due to my duty to protect the village. Please deliver the lunch box to him!

194339.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「ありがとうござ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Thank you, I'll try to get back to
you!Now <pc>. Here you go.

194340.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「キャプテンに:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>If you see the captain, please let him
know that Mayakuni is in charge of the
village. Thank you very much.

194341.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「まあ ありが:
Well, thank you very much!But seems to be taking on a lot of favors. I'll be here, so please
come back when you've finished your other business.

194342.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「……そうですか:
I see. That's a problem. I would have thought that , who is a friend of Captain Stolke, would have
been able to help. I have no choice. If <&13_aaaaaaad> changes his mind, please come again.

194343.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「<pc>さん:
! Thank you for coming. I wanted to help Captain Stolke, who is serving as the Ship Shaper, by making
a lunch box for him.Please deliver the lunch box to him on behalf of me, who has the responsibility to protect this
village!

194344.<pc>は マヤクニに\nキャプテン・シュトルケの 居場所を教えた。:
<pc> told Mayakuni the
location of Captain Stolke.

194345.マヤクニは 会話を打ち切ると\n急ぎ どこかへ走っていった。<se_nots m:
Mayakuni broke off the conversation
and hurriedly ran somewhere.<se_nots map_common 2><bw_break>

194346.そして すぐに 戻ってきた！<se_nots map_common 2>: And soon they were back!<se_nots map_common 2>

194347.<pc>は マヤクニから\n樹天の里弁当（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me:
<pc> received Treetop Town
Bento (Key Item) from Mayakuni!<me 60>

194348.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「お役目のため:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Please deliver the lunch box I made to
Captain Stolke at the Gran Zedora
Territory watchtower for his service.<open_irai><bw_break>

194349.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「そして あの:
And when you see her, please tell her that Mayakuni will take good care of her village. I'm looking forward to
working with you.

194350.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「まあ キャプ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Well, I see you met Captain Stolke.
So, did you deliver the lunch box? I
see. That's a problem.<open_irai><bw_break>

194351.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「お手間を取ら:
I apologize for the inconvenience, but please continue to do what Captain Stolke asks of you. Thank you very
much.

194352.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「先ほど <p:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I just watched <pc> get off
the Sacred Ship. I see you met Captain
Stolke. Did you eat your lunch box?

194353.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「はぁ よかった:
I'm glad he enjoyed the lunch box so much. As his squire, I am happy to be of service to him. We are a family
that has served the Ship Shaper for generations, and we have been entrusted to take care of the Ship
Shaper's personal needs so that he can fulfill his duties. Captain Stolke has a sense of humor that is sometimes
difficult for me to understand.

194354.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「魔王軍との戦:
He has helped and welcomed into the land those who have been burned in their villages, those who have lost
their homes, and those who have been severely wounded since the war with the Demon King's army began. The
people of the village know that his outlandish behavior is an attempt to reopen the closed hearts of those who
have lost their homes. Captain Stolke has turned to because of reports of <%sev_que_name0> attacking
wagons passing through the streets. After the defeat of the Demon King, many supplies were brought to Gran
Zedora Kingdom. The wagons' supplies are essential for postwar reconstruction.

194355.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「……おっと:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Oops, that was a long story, but I
haven't thanked you yet. Here is the
reward.

194356.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「また キャプテ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>If you see Captain Stolke again,
please tell him to return to his
hometown once in a while.

194358.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「また キャプテ:

194513.<pc>は 天樹のたねを\nひと粒 つまんでみた。\n<br>\n天樹のたねは:
<&13_aaaaaaaad> picked up a piece of Heavenly Seeds. The Heavenly Seeds were heavy and heavy in comparison
with their appearance, and I could feel their hidden power.

194907.『世界つけもの大全』という 分厚い本だ。\n表紙からは おいしそうな つけものの:
It is a thick book titled "Sekai Tsukemono Daikon" ("The Complete Guide to Tsukemono in the World"). From the
cover of the book, the smell of delicious pickles is wafting in the air. But the pages are too heavy for
me to take it off the bookshelf! It seems that this book is made of stone.
